1.title: Flats Are for Quiters
1.plot: Armed with a fashion truck full of must haves, style experts, Emily Dees-Boulden and Nicole Noles transform a busy mom with trendy wardrobe savers. They also give a recent film school graduate a jaw dropping makeover to celebrate her recent 60 pound weight-loss.

2.title: Fashion Risks
2.plot: Emily and Nicole help a young poet, who hides behind countless childish layers, to finally discover her sexy side, and a female construction worker who can build a house, but not an outfit, find her idea of sexy before a bachelorette weekend in Vegas.

3.title: Date Night Done Right
3.plot: Emily and Nicole completely transform a husband and wife who are approaching the seven-year-itch and stuck in a style rut.

4.title: From Ringside to Runway
4.plot: A boxing Guinness World Record holder gets knocked out of her comfort zone and into a championship worthy makeover. Then, Emily and Nicole glam-over a nurse whose long-time boyfriend has never seen her dressed up!

5.title: Textbook Fashion
5.plot: Emily and Nicole help best friends and elementary school teachers trade in their child-friendly staples for ultra glam and super trendy must-haves in time for their grown-up and sophisticated school fundraiser.

6.title: Deliciously on Trend
6.plot: Emily and Nicole help a former model rediscover her runway strut and push a Humane Society executive to unleash her #girlboss style.

7.title: Two Makeovers on the Rocks, Hold the Lime
7.plot: Emily and Nicole trade in their seven-inch stilettos for rock climbing kicks as they transform a tomboy trainer into a beach blonde stunner for her crush's big party. Then, a college-coed whose look is stuck in high-school gets a sophisticated glam-over that's two semesters over due!

8.title: One Hour Swank
8.plot: Give Emily and Nicole an hour and they will change your life! The style experts turn a casual burger-flipping chef into street-chic glam before her 5th anniversary celebration and school a flight attendant on French fashion before her flight to Paris...all in under an hour!

9.title: Cross Country Couture
9.plot: Two Cities. Two fashion trucks. Two make-overs! A Los Angeles Marine swaps her faded cargo-camo for a drop-dead sexy date night look, meanwhile in Atlanta, a heartbroken local gets a crash course on "single girl" style.

10.title: Here Comes the Swank
10.plot: Emily and Nicole park their fashion truck at Alabama's largest bridal expo where they makeover a bride-to-be for her Mexican honeymoon and completely glam-over one lucky `plain Jane' before her wedding rehearsal dinner.

11.title: Fashion Vixens
11.plot: Emily and Nicole visit Atlanta's naughty erotic-expo where they glam-over a frustrated local whose been waiting five years for her boyfriend to propose and completely overhaul a single gal's style and her online dating profile, getting her "swipe right" ready.

12.title: Game of Crowns
12.plot: Emily and Nicole play beauty pageant coaches as they take an Atlanta hopeful's style from boring and predictable, to over-the-top glam. Meanwhile, her super shy bestie finally breaks-out of her shell with the help of new clothes, hair, makeup and attitude!

imdb.title: Get Swank'd
plot: We're sending glam besties EMILY DEES BOULDEN and NICOLE NOLES on a trendsetting road trip adventure in the hottest phenomenon on wheels, a fashion truck! Get ready for a makeover format like no other! It's the ultimate buddy comedy.
